Message: To think you would save my life not once, but twice...

You will always be there to save me, won’t you...
Just as you did all those years ago...

(Oh, my lord...
I knew that the only one for me to serve...was you...)

The world is being ravaged by Curses,
so why is the Church carrying out this “Witch Hunt...?”

It’s because they claim, “If we kill the witches,
then the Curses will vanish along with them.”
Although, it looks like they’re the ones behind the spread of the Curses.

We’ve got company...!
Iris, do you still have some fight left in you?

Of course I do.
This world needs the Duke more than anyone right now.
I won’t let you Church swine steal him away from us!
